TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
select 'T' RECORD_ID, 'CC' SOURCE_CODE, lpad(to_char(to_number(indbt.txt_key_value) + to_number(incrd.txt_key_value)),8,'0') TOTAL_DETAIL_RECORDS, lpad(indbt.txt_key_value,8,'0') TOTAL_DEBIT_RECORDS, lpad(incrd.txt_key_value,8,'0') TOTAL_CREDIT_RECORDS FROM in_etl_control incrd, in_etl_control indbt where incrd.TXT_KEY_STRING = 'ACCT_PAYMENT_CREDIT_RECORD_COUNT' and incrd.txt_file_name = '$$STR_PROCESSING_UNIT' and indbt.TXT_KEY_STRING = 'ACCT_PAYMENT_DEBIT_RECORD_COUNT' and indbt.txt_file_name = '$$STR_PROCESSING_UNIT'
/*SELECT 'T' RECORD_ID, 'CC' SOURCE_CODE, lpad(COUNT(*),8,'0') TOTAL_DETAIL_RECORDS, lpad(nvl(SUM(CASE WHEN OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),'0'),8,'0') TOTAL_DEBIT_RECORDS, lpad(nvl(SUM(CASE WHEN OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),'0'),8,'0') TOTAL_CREDIT_RECORDS FROM OUT_ACCT_DETAIL INNER JOIN in_etl_control inctrl on inctrl.TXT_KEY_STRING = 'OPER_CYCLE_DATE' and inctrl.txt_file_name = 'GLOBAL' and OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.txt_status = 'ACTIVE' AND out_acct_detail.dte_cycle_date = TO_DATE(inctrl.txt_key_value, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --AND out_acct_detail.txt_acct_type = 'P' --and out_acct_detail.DTE_SUSPEND IS NULL INNER JOIN in_etl_control inctrl2 on inctrl2.TXT_KEY_STRING = '$$STR_ACCT_CYCLE_TYPE' and inctrl2.TXT_FILE_NAME = '$$STR_PROCESSING_UNIT' AND OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CYCLE_TYPE = inctrl2.txt_key_value WHERE OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_BUSINESS_UNIT in ($$STR_BUSINESS_UNIT) AND DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ NOT IN (SELECT DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ FROM out_acct_detail_result_trace WHERE TXT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE')*/

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT IN_ETL_CONTROL.TXT_KEY_VALUE FROM IN_ETL_CONTROL WHERE IN_ETL_CONTROL.TXT_KEY_STRING='OPER_CYCLE_DATE' AND TXT_FILE_NAME='GLOBAL'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.DEC_BATCH_NUM, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.DTE_CYCLE_DATE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CYCLE_TYPE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_PROCESSINGUNIT, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_BUSINESS_UNIT, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_AGENT_POSITION_NAME, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_AGENCY_POSITION_NAME, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_EARNING_GROUP, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_CODE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_CURRENCY, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_SETTLMENT_WAY, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CHANNEL_CD FROM OUT_ACCT_DETAIL INNER JOIN in_etl_control inctrl on inctrl.TXT_KEY_STRING = 'OPER_CYCLE_DATE' and inctrl.txt_file_name = 'GLOBAL' and OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.txt_status = 'ACTIVE' AND out_acct_detail.dte_cycle_date = TO_DATE(inctrl.txt_key_value, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --AND out_acct_detail.txt_acct_type = 'P' --and out_acct_detail.DTE_SUSPEND IS NULL INNER JOIN in_etl_control inctrl2 on inctrl2.TXT_KEY_STRING = '$$STR_ACCT_CYCLE_TYPE' and inctrl2.TXT_FILE_NAME = '$$STR_PROCESSING_UNIT' AND OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CYCLE_TYPE = inctrl2.txt_key_value WHERE OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_BUSINESS_UNIT in ($$STR_BUSINESS_UNIT) AND OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT<>0 AND DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ NOT IN (SELECT DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ FROM out_acct_detail_result_trace WHERE TXT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') UNION SELECT -1, -1, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.DTE_CYCLE_DATE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CYCLE_TYPE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_PROCESSINGUNIT, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_BUSINESS_UNIT, '', '', '', '$$STR_INBALANCE_ACCT', SUM(OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT)*-1, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_CURRENCY, '', '' FROM OUT_ACCT_DETAIL INNER JOIN in_etl_control inctrl on inctrl.TXT_KEY_STRING = 'OPER_CYCLE_DATE' and inctrl.txt_file_name = 'GLOBAL' and OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.txt_status = 'ACTIVE' AND out_acct_detail.dte_cycle_date = TO_DATE(inctrl.txt_key_value, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --AND out_acct_detail.txt_acct_type = 'P' --and out_acct_detail.DTE_SUSPEND IS NULL INNER JOIN in_etl_control inctrl2 on inctrl2.TXT_KEY_STRING = '$$STR_ACCT_CYCLE_TYPE' and inctrl2.TXT_FILE_NAME = '$$STR_PROCESSING_UNIT' AND OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CYCLE_TYPE = inctrl2.txt_key_value WHERE OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_BUSINESS_UNIT in ($$STR_BUSINESS_UNIT) AND OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT<>0 AND DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ NOT IN (SELECT DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ FROM out_acct_detail_result_trace WHERE TXT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') GROUP BY OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.DTE_CYCLE_DATE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_CYCLE_TYPE, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_PROCESSINGUNIT, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_BUSINESS_UNIT, OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_CURRENCY HAVING SUM(OUT_ACCT_DETAIL.TXT_ACCT_AMOUNT)<>0

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL

TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: O_TXT_AGENT_CODE
O_TXT_AGENCY_CODE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF((ISNULL(V_LK_BANK_ACCT_CODE) and ISNULL(V_LK_FA_BANK_ACCT_CODE)) AND TXT_ACCT_CODE!=$$STR_AIAS_AR, TXT_CHANNEL_CD, '')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: O_CHANNEL_CODE
O_DEC_ACCT_DETAIL_SEQ
